greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers that are congruent to {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7} mod 8.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-2,2,-2,2,-1).
mathematica: Select[Range[0, 100], MemberQ[{1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7}, Mod[#, 8]] &] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 16 2016 *)
program: (MAGMA) [n : n in [0..100] | n mod 8 in [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 16 2016
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
